item.title: CVE-2021-20652|2024-08-03T17:45:45.342Z -- j.%20peters -- name%20directory
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Name Directory 1.17.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.
